name: 郭宗賢
objective:
倫理旨在探討人與人的關係與行為規範，本課程旨在以利害關係人的觀點提出一個完整的架構，用以解釋及說明企業如何制定倫理決策及處理倫理爭議，希望透過本課程的研討，能使企業倫理具體落實於企業日常營運與個人行為決策中。

Ethics aims to explore the relationships and behavioral norms among people. This course aims to provide an overall framework, from a stakeholder perspective, to explain and illustrate how businesses establish ethical strategies and handling ethical disputes. Through this course discussion, the learners will be able to implement business ethics into the daily business practices and individual behavioral decision-making.

第六週 Ch05 生產決策與企業倫理
第七週 Ch06 行銷與企業倫理
第八週 Ch07 人力資源與企業倫理
第九週 期中考試
第十週 Ch08 研發與企業倫理
